structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Any person who knowingly or willfully makes any false or fraudulent statement or representation in any record or report to the commission under KRS 95A.280 shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500), or imprisoned for not less than thirty (30) days nor more than one (1) year, or both.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 373, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1980.
